member.name: D2D1_GRADIENT_STOP
member.summary: Contains the position and color of a gradient stop.

member.name: D2D1_GRADIENT_STOP.position
member.summary: A value that indicates the relative position of the gradient stop in the brush. This value must be in the [0.0f, 1.0f] range if the gradient stop is to be seen explicitly.

member.name: D2D1_GRADIENT_STOP.color
member.summary: The color of the gradient stop.
